p: Preclinical evidence. This herbal medicine has been experimentally proven for anti-viral activity. The commercial extract EPs 7630 ® interfered in vitro with the replication of different respiratory viruses, including human coronavirus ( Michaelis et al., 2011), Influenza virus ( in vitro and in vivo) ( Theisen and Muller, 2012), and Rhinovirus isolated from patients with severe asthma ( Roth et al., 2019). EPs 7630 was able to stimulate IFN-β in vitro, and gallic acid enhanced the expression of iNOS and TNF-α ( Kolodziej et al., 2003).
